Author: vices666777
Text: yeah currently I have a scale that shows different weights going 5-6 lbs in either direction if you move it an inch so it's completely unreliable and it's driving me crazy. one time I had a scale that showed the same exact weight to the decimal every single time I stepped on it for 3 months despite me visibly losing tons of weight, and I just used it to punish myself and make me work harder, even though I knew it was wrong? lol, I hate being a slave to these things, I mean the least they can do in return to my all-encompassing devotion to them is work correctly.
